Extra-Fine Almond Flour.details: Blue Diamond Extra-Fine Almond Flour has a rich and buttery taste that is slightly sweet. It has an incredibly smooth texture, unlike many gluten-free flours that tend to be gritty and rough. Because of it's taste and texture, it is an optimum flour substitute, and works in both sweet and savory dishes.
